connect4

Class Connect4View

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • connect4.Connect4View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Connect4Test.TestView

    public class Connect4View
extends javafx.application.Application
implements java.util.Observer
    This class serves as the UI for the Connect4 program.

    This class is an Observer of the Connect4Model class.

    Author:
    Kristopher Rangel, Caroline O'Neill (integrating multi-threading from controller)

      • initBoard

        private void initBoard()
          initBoard

            private void initBoard ()

          A run-once function that sets the initial state of the Connect4 board.

          This function sets the board background, alignment, and padding. Then it invokes the createCircles() method.

      • onClick

        private void onClick(double xCoord)
          onClick

            private void onClick (double xCoord)

          This method takes the mouse cursor x-coordinate and converts it into the appropriate column. Then it invokes the selectColumn(int) method to complete the on click action.
        Parameters:
        xCoord - - the x-coordinate of the mouse cursor location on click

      • selectColumn

        private void selectColumn(int column)
          selectColumn

            private void selectColumn (int column)

          Checks selected column for valid move and performs move, if available.
        Parameters:
        column - - the column selected to perform a move on
